Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems with anode off-gas recirculation (AGR) and diesel prereforming are advantageous because they can operate with the current fuel infrastructure.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of the diesel pre-reforming solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recycling in the SchIBZ project. Part I: Modeling and validation

Sentencas: In the SchIBZ-project, the prototype of such a SOFC system for maritime applications has already been commissioned.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of the diesel pre-reforming solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recycling in the SchIBZ project. Part I: Modeling and validation

Sentencas: In this first paper, we model the system devices to conduct an exergy analysis of this real SOFC plant and validate them with experimental values from experiments in laboratory scale.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of the diesel pre-reforming solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recycling in the SchIBZ project. Part I: Modeling and validation

Sentencas: The results of our simulation agree well with the experimental values.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of the diesel pre-reforming solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recycling in the SchIBZ project. Part I: Modeling and validation

Sentencas: The calculations with the validated results may be closer to the real thermodynamic behavior of such system components than previous literature.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of the diesel pre-reforming solid oxide fuel cell system with anode off-gas recycling in the SchIBZ project. Part I: Modeling and validation
